meanings.sent1: The coffee was refiltered to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: She refiltered the water to remove any remaining impurities.
meanings.sent3: The refiltered air smelled fresher than before.
meanings.sent4: The refiltered sunlight brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The refiltered music sounded clearer and more vibrant.

meanings.definition: Passed through a filter for a second time.
meanings.sent1: He refiltered the oil to ensure it was pure.
meanings.sent2: The scientist refiltered the solution to obtain accurate results.
meanings.sent3: She refiltered her thoughts before making a decision.
meanings.sent4: The information was refiltered through various sources.
meanings.sent5: The data was refiltered for any errors or inconsistencies.
